result.reason: Enhances usability by allowing users to find connections even when parent folders are collapsed, which is a common user expectation.
result.approach: Investigate TreeListView filtering behavior; potentially subclass the underlying Tree model or override RebuildList/ModelFilter to ensure collapsed nodes are evaluated during filtering.
